body:
We've rummaged around the web & found 15 new websites with a strong use of typography.

Check them out!

## [Jessica Hägg](https://jessica.work/) 

![Jessica Hägg Landing Page](/images/uploads/jessica.jpg)

![Nonymous Landing Page](/images/uploads/nonymous-type.jpg)

short: A collection of new websites with strong typography!
